item.title: Recent Trends and Developments in IP and ADR: China
item.description: This post summarizes recent trends and developments [policies, legislations, regulations, and judicial decisions] in China in the field of intellectual property and innovation, especially with regard to arbitration and mediation.   China Policy – I. Expanding the Opening-Up of Commercial Arbitration Services A brand-new chapter for international arbitral institutions to set up business organizations in China. August 2019 Shanghai Foreign arbitral institutions permitted to conduct arbitration businesses in Shanghai’s pilot free trade zone.
